Package ro.vlad.security

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharsetFilter
    Necessary for ensuring consistent character encoding between requests and responses Forces UTF-8 on all traffic
    LoginFilter
    Handles all the login requests and check the session for existence of the "authenticatedUser" attribute It defaults to the home page and invalidates the session if requirements are not met
    LoginServlet
    Processes the login request, compares it's parameters against the contents of the database and decides where to send the user Displays a relevant message, depending on the circumstances
    LogoutServlet
    Called when a user decides to close the session Nullifies the "authenticatedUser" parameter of the session and invalidates it
    PasswordStorage
    Contains all the methods required to encrypt passwords and to check the input against the stored hashcodes
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException  
    PasswordStorage.InvalidHashException
